EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey on Thursday, December 10, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, December 10, 2015 Time: 10:30 AM Mumbai / 1:00 PM Singapore / 4:00 PM Sydney Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1101252/F626EC180AF2686A58F3E9AFFD0DF82B> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date - APJ Greenfield:default=edit me}}
Did you know that Matt Stine recently published an O'Reilly Microservices eBook? This report defines the unique characteristics of cloud native application architectures such as microservices and twelve-factor applications. Download it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-matt-stine-ebook>!
We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
